summary: John Willard is identified as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt and Harvey Lowmyer, who is suspected of assassinating Martin Luther King, Jr. The documents consist of CIA cables disseminating information about Galt/Lowmyer/Willard to various locations worldwide, seeking assistance in locating him. The cables provide aliases and physical descriptions to aid in the search.
significance: John Willard is an alias used by a suspect in the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr., making him a person of interest in the investigation of that event, although the documents provided do not connect him to the JFK assassination.
